This is the list of 3rd Party Libraries we are currently using for Nkata:

1.  Click -- is a python package for creating beautiful Command line interface.
     Author: Armin Ronacher
     License: BSD licenses


2.  Jinga2 -- A small but fast and easy to use stand-alone template engine written in pure python.
     Author: Armin Ronacher
     License: BSD licenses
     Copyright (c) 2009 by the Jinja Team


3.  BeautifulSoup(bs4) -- an HTML or XML parser, providing pythonic Idioms for iterating, searching and modifying the parse tree.
     Author: Leonard Richardson
     License: MIT Licenses


4. PyYAML -- YAML is a data serialization format designed for human readability and interaction with scripting languages.
    Author: Kirill Simonov
    License: MIT Licenses
